attributes.action: give free care to all the elderly in residential and nursing homes
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is a scandal after working all their lives and paying taxes and having saved money  for their old age and children,that this and their property could be sold for their future care.Why should this be free in Scotland and not England.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
